title: Bedspread, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave with looped wefts
dimensions: H x W: 292 x 160 cm (9 ft. 6 15/16 in. x 5 ft. 3 in.)
description: White bedcover with a ribbed pattern made of weft loops. Design shows a central octagon with four flowering plants and star with four rays. Borders are geometric forms alternating with a plant form. In one corner: "A.F. 13."

tombstone.epitaph:
Bedspread, 19th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave with looped wefts. 1939-68-11.
